svt_uart_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks Class Reference

Inheritance diagram for class svt_uart_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The coverage data callback class defines default data and event information that are used to implement the coverage groups. The coverage data callback class is extended from callback class svt_uart_monitor_callback . This class itself does not contain any cover groups. The constructor of this class gets svt_uart_configuration handle as an argument, which is used for shaping the coverage.

Member Function Documentation

  function void
 svt_uart_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks::activate_dynamic_pattern_match
 (  uvm_component component  ) 

Method to kick off the dynamic pattern match processes. This forks off one process for each pattern sequence in cov_seq. This function forks off processes which will stay alive until halted by the monitor which initiated the call to this method.

component - A reference to the monitor object these callbacks are registered with.

  function void
 svt_uart_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks::new
 (  svt_uart_configuration cfg , string name = "svt_uart_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks"  )

  function void
 svt_uart_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks::startup
 (  uvm_component component  ) 

Callback issued by component to allow callbacks to initiate activities. This callback is issued during the start_of_simulation phase.

component - A reference to the component object issuing this callback.

 svt_uart_configuration  attribute

 svt_pattern_sequence  attribute
 svt_uart_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks::cov_seq[int]

Array of pattern sequences that are to be matched

 svt_sequence_item_base_queue_iter  attribute
 svt_uart_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks::cov_seq_iter[int]

When a cov_seq_match is triggered as part of a match, this variable contains a list of the svt_uart_transaction objects (i.e., strongly typed) matching the pattern sequence.

 svt_uart_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks::rx_xact_event

 event  attribute
 svt_uart_monitor_def_cov_data_callbacks::seq_match_event

Event corresponding to the different pattern sequences, triggered when the corresponding pattern sequences are matched as part of an implementation scan of the transfer. The index into the array is based on the svt_pattern_sequence pttrn_seq_id data member.
